name: Wintercraft
desc:
You channel intense winter magic to craft an object made of ice anywhere within the area of the spell. It can be up to a 10 foot by 10 foot cube in size. You can use 1 AP once on each of your turns for the duration of the spell to create another object.

Each object has 30 hit points, AC 10, and vulnerability to fire and bludgeoning damage. It is permanent until destroyed.
empower: You can spend 1 AP to create an object twice per turn.
author: CrusaderDroid
